DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Studying sample tumor tissue patient cancer laboratory may help doctor identify learn biomarkers related cancer . It may also help doctor find good way treat cancer . PURPOSE : This research trial study gene sample patient limit advanced diffuse large B-cell lymphoma .
DOC.brief_title: S9704-S0014-S0313A Studying Genes Samples From Patients With Limited Advanced Diffuse Large B-Cell Lymphoma
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To determine proportion cell origin subtypes ( germinal center B-cell-like [ GCB ] v non-GCB ) expression level prognostic gene previously identify diffuse large B-cell lymphoma ( DLBCL ) patient biopsy sample SWOG trial limited- advanced-stage DLBCL , assess association result progression-free survival ( PFS ) . - To assess association marker result overall survival ( OS ) . OUTLINE : Archived formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded tissue analyze gene expression profile quantitative nuclease protection assay ( qNPA ) immunohistochemical analysis . Results compare patient 's progression-free survival overall survival .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Diffuse large Bcell lymphoma Initial diagnostic tissue block , 4 unstained slide Tissue patient limitedstage DLBCL enrol SWOG trial treat cyclophosphamide , doxorubicin hydrochloride , prednisone , vincristine sulfate ( CHOP ) , monoclonal antiCD20 antibody backbone SWOGS0014 SWOGS0313 Tissue patient advancedstage DLBCL enrol SWOG trial treat CHOP monoclonal antiCD20 antibody backbone SWOGS9704 SWOGS0433 SWOGS0515 SWOGS0806 PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Not specify PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : See Disease Characteristics
